Segment.name: PSC
Segment.comment: To describe the conditions of a product service contract as in a warranty registration

Field.name: ContractStatusCode
Field.comment: Code designating the current status of the contract

Field.name: TypeOfProductServiceCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of product service contract or the basis of the product service claim

Field.name: TypeOfProductServiceCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of product service contract or the basis of the product service claim

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: EntityIdentifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying an organizational entity, a physical location, property or an individual

Field.name: ContractNumber
Field.comment: Contract number

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure1
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: Count
Field.comment: Occurrence counter

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure2
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: RangeMaximum
Field.comment: The value specifying the maximum of the measurement range

Field.name: RangeMinimum
Field.comment: The value specifying the minimum of the measurement range

Field.name: MeasurementValue
Field.comment: The value of the measurement

Field.name: ActionCode
Field.comment: Code indicating type of action

Field.name: Percent
Field.comment: Percentage expressed as a decimal

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: OperationEnvironmentCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the conditions under which this product will be used or the operating application of the product

Field.name: SpecialServicesCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the special service

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: ContactMethodCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of contact

SyntaxNote.name: P0708
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PSC07 or PSC08 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L12131415
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC12 is present, then at least one of PSC13, PSC14 or PSC15 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1312
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC13 is present, then PSC12 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1412
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC14 is present, then PSC12 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1512
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC15 is present, then PSC12 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: L160810
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC16 is present, then at least one of PSC08 or PSC10 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1613
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC16 is present, then PSC13 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1820
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC18 is present, then PSC20 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C1918
SyntaxNote.comment: If PSC19 is present, then PSC18 is required.
